definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
an ant hole may cause the collapse of a great dike (idiom)/huge damage may result from a moment's negligence
pinyin: qian1 li3 zhi1 di1 , kui4 yu2 yi3 xue2

definition: Kinderdijk, village in the Netherlands with a large network of windmills attracting many tourists

sentences.english: The mechanism of piping and piping failure in Jingjiang Dike foundation is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文探討荊江大堤堤基管湧和管湧破壞的機理。

sentences.english: Among these directors in new century, Yukihiko Tsutsumi has special meaning for research.
sentences.chinese: 在衆多的新世紀導演中，堤幸彥具有獨特的研究意義。

sentences.english: Several political parties allied with each other against higher taxes.
sentences.chinese: 幾個政治黨派聯合起來反對堤高稅收。

sentences.english: Tyche was the name of the "good sister" of Nemesis.
sentences.chinese: 在神話中，堤喀是涅墨西斯的“好姐妹”。

sentences.english: Defining compensation scope of flood plain areas in lower reaches of the Yellow River;
sentences.chinese: 黃河下游灘區生產堤對防洪造成了一定影響。

sentences.english: Using the concept of directional wave fields, the characteristics of the wave field around a detached breakwater were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本研究利用方向頻譜探論離岸堤周圍波場的特性。

sentences.english: They also burn fat fast because they improve aerobic conditioning.
sentences.chinese: 他們還迅速燃燒脂肪，因爲它們堤高有氧空調。

sentences.english: The dyke has since been named The Life-Saver.
sentences.chinese: 從此，人們就把這個堤稱作救命堤。

sentences.english: The dyke has since been named The Life-Saver.
sentences.chinese: 從此，人們就把這個堤稱作救命堤。

sentences.english: The first dike was built in AD 821 by the poet Bai Juyi.
sentences.chinese: 第一道堤由詩人白居易於821年所建。

sentences.english: At first, qualitative experiments were carried out for the case where a breakwater is the sole factor affecting the wave field.
sentences.chinese: 首先在水槽裏進行僅有一個單一的離岸堤的試驗。

sentences.english: They are also able to evaluate the cooing effectiveness of fractured-rock embankment across any part of a certain interface.
sentences.chinese: 另外，它們還能夠分區域評價碎石路堤降溫效果。

sentences.english: To build rubble mound breakwaters directly on soft soil foundation, it often meets the problem how to avoid the overall unstability.
sentences.chinese: 直接在軟基上建造斜坡堤，常有發生整體失穩的危險。

sentences.english: I put a dam across it to have it for my use， that is why the stream dried up.
sentences.chinese: 我蓋起一道堤把它攔起給我使用，因此泉幹了。

sentences.english: With clear water and willow trees along the bank, it is the most popular tourist scenic spot with residents of Qingzhou.
sentences.chinese: 碧波粼粼，堤柳成蔭，是青州人喜愛的一處勝景。

sentences.english: The supervisor made it clear to the workers that they had to increase their productivity.
sentences.chinese: 管理者明白地向勞工們說明他們必須堤高生產力。

definition: big/stream or canal/drain/ditch/CL:條|条[tiao2]/him (dialect)/outer rim of a carriage wheel (old)
